deprecated.description: Please note that this parameter is no longer available in DataTables as of v2. It has been replaced with `-init language.aria.orderable` and `-init language.aria.orderableReverse`.

dt-option.description:
ARIA label that is added to the table headers when the column may be sorted descending by activating the column (click or return when focused).
Note that the column header text is prefixed to this string.
